constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 111 (Tuesday, July 5, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. TORRES:
H.R. 8292.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8.
[Page H5935]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

title: To require a report on Puerto Rico's progress toward rebuilding the electric grid and detailing the efforts the Federal Government is undertaking to expedite such rebuilding, and for other purposes.
